content: Where can I download the StructureDefinition XML files for IG profiles, e.g. DAF and QICore? They are published on fhir.org, but no longer included in any of the spec downloads.

The SD files for the latest (stu3 based ) DAF-Core can be downloaded right from the content page.
pasted image
For the DSTU2 version you can screen scrape from the xml tab at top. pasted image
But I think going forward with the DAF-core we will create a link to download the definitions zip file that includes all the definitions. That was an oversight.

Thanks Eric, I am looking for STU3. That link does not exist for current build (which is what I prefer). I see the link for the Sept ballot, but I need all profiles in the IG, preferably as a ZIP. Are the files in SVN or github?

there are not in SVN - I checked. I'm pretty sure nothing has changed since the ballot yet in the DAF -Core. Here is my local copy of the definitions files which is the same as the Ballot version EXCEPT for patient ( where I changed the race cardinality) and observation results.definitions.xml.zip definitions.json.zip
